content.question:
You will participate in simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Zhang Ting, the faculty adviser to your schools’ Chinese club, about plans for the club’s annual daylong field trip.

Response 1
